column4: sup peeps, uped to 10.04 and the purple boot screen sux - what are my customize options?
there are some plymouth themes in the repo
also some of us have had some right issues with it, but  a little while ago I found out how to fix mine,  thanks to rww
right issues ?
yes Plymouth doesn't like propritary Nivida and ATI drivers
so when that's installed,  there will be problems
ya ive got nvidia geforce 8800 gt
Plymouth has been loading up ok for you though, it sounded like
did you install propritary driver?
yes
Plymouth is still loading up alright though?
well depends on card and driver if there are issues or not
the driver was installed before my distro upgrade
the driver was stilll installed, when I upgrded from 9.10, and then I had Plymouth issues
i havent noticed any issues, just dont like the purple
right well as I already told you, some other themes you can use instead, that are in the repo
also that's the new colour of Ubuntu, purple
alright ill check it out
aburgine or whatever it's called
well whoever is in charge of picking these colors - has bad taste
yeah brown is better than purple
indeed
for an OS
